action.action-desc: Mr. Tipton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To extend the authorization of the Uranium Mill Tailing Radiation Control Act of 1978 relating to the disposal site in Mesa County, Colorado.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Responsible Disposal Reauthorization Act of 2017.
Section 112(a)(1)(B) of the Uranium Mill Tailing Radiation Control Act of 1978 (42 U.S.C. 7922(a)(1)(B)) is amended by striking September 30, 2023 and inserting September 30, 2048.
